conversion_summary.dms_tool_usage: Not applicable - No raw SQL statements exist

conversion_approach.reason: Application uses Entity Framework 6 with LINQ to Entities exclusively. The EntityFramework6.Npgsql provider (v6.4.3) automatically translates LINQ queries to PostgreSQL-compatible SQL at runtime.
conversion_approach.query_generation: Runtime query generation by Entity Framework
conversion_approach.schema_compatibility: All entity models use standard CLR types that map directly to PostgreSQL types

schema_object_transformations.notes: No schema object name transformations required. Entity Framework uses entity model names directly.

verification_notes.reason: No SQL statement pairs (original -> converted) exist since no raw SQL is present
verification_notes.runtime_translation: LINQ queries are translated to PostgreSQL SQL at runtime by the Npgsql provider
